author: @soulscreation3875
text: Sir, Good Day ! I want some guidance for resources for Data Science and Artificial Intelligence Gate Syllabus. Link : https://gate2024.iisc.ac.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/GATE2024DataScienceAIsyllabus.pdf

author: @gonzalodiazamor5494
text: Three main areas where candidates often struggle: -> Lack of Foundation Knowledge:         The speaker emphasizes the importance of having a strong foundation in basic concepts such as Python programming, statistics, and data science skills.         Many interview questions are based on these foundational topics, so it is crucial to have a good understanding of them.         Candidates should practice and improve their foundation knowledge to increase their chances of success in interviews.  -> Inability to Explain Concepts Properly:         The speaker points out that candidates often struggle to explain concepts clearly and concisely.         It is important to be able to explain topics in a way that the interviewer can understand.         Candidates should practice explaining concepts to others, such as friends or by talking in front of a mirror.         Using examples and multiple approaches can help improve the ability to explain concepts effectively.  -> Difficulty in Explaining End-to-End Projects:         Candidates often struggle to explain the projects they have worked on during interviews.         It is important to consider the entire life cycle of a project and be able to explain its goals, challenges, and outcomes.         Practicing explaining projects and understanding the techniques used is crucial for success in interviews.
